description.value:
Trigger You roll initiative.

Rebellions require an intricate knowledge of one's surroundingsâ€”because you might need to escape at any moment. You remember the locations of escape routes, ambush spots, and cover from a scouting expedition or a previous visit to the area. Roll a [[/r 1d20]]{d20}. At any point during the subsequent combat, you can substitute the result of this roll instead of rolling a d20 on one Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Create a Diversion] or on one Stealth check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide].

value.value: Horizon Walker Dedication or Scout Dedication
